turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I have family plans with the kids tonight and I need you to order Pizza from Pizza Hut for us.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutley just let me know when you've decided on your order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking maybe a large meat lovers pan and a pepperoni lovers for the kids

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great , do you need any sides

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: maybe some cheesy bread sticks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: let me think on it a minute

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: go ahead take your time

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: maybe we should add some bone out wings, probably barbecue

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure that's all you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that will be plenty

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will get it ordered right away

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you so much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are so welcome,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: did they give you a time on delivery

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: having pizza with my children is one of my favorite things

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can imagine, its the same for me and my kids

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you said about 25 minutes right, that's pretty fast

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes I'm about to leave now..

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you we look forward to it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: call me if you forgot or need anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will
